menu.logAttention: Logs are not sent automatically, so please send them to the developer if necessary.

top.description: Laberu is otoing tool for UTAU VoiceBanks
top.selectZipButtonText: Agree to the terms of use and Select the UTAU VoiceBanks zip file
top.ruleDescription: Only voice sources with permission from the voice rights holder may be used.
top.ruleDescription2: If you wish to use someone else's voice, you must obtain their explicit permission.
top.privacyAnalytics: This website uses Google's access analysis tool "Google Analytics." Google Analytics uses cookies to collect data. This data is collected anonymously and does not identify individuals.
top.privacyCookie: We use cookies on our site to customize how you experience our site.
changelog: 2025/02/16 Fixed a bug where the first WAV file was not loaded correctly when recording with a specific reclist.
2024/07/14 Add:Make Oto Template for filename = alias.
2024/07/12 Each parameter can now be changed on the alias editing view.
2024/07/09 The display on the screen has been restored. Scrolling function has been implemented.
2024/07/08 The preutter is always displayed on the screen.

loadZipDialog.title: Read Zip
loadZipDialog.reload: Reload with the specified character code

targetDirDialog.title: Select the folder to oto
targetDirDialog.reload: Reload with the specified character code
targetDirDialog.hasPositiveBlankError: The cutoff is a positive number, so recording bpm correction is not possible.

makePanel.title: generate mode
makePanel.multi: Multiple aliases from one wav file.

settings.skipBeginingNumber: Ignore numbers at the beginning of file names
settings.offset: Length from the beginning of wav to the first beat (ms)
settings.maxnum: Number of duplicate aliases created (unlimited if 0)
settings.underbar: An underbar in the middle of a file name is treated as a 1-beat rest.
settings.beginingCv: Add - to the alias at the beginning of wav
settings.Head: Generate a wav head alias

batchProcess.wavNotFound: Delete records that do not contain wav
batchProcess.recordNotFound: Add records for wav with no data
batchProcess.limitedNumber: Limit the number of sequential numbers
batchProcess.negativeBlank: Make the cutoff a negative number
batchProcess.addSurfix: Add characters to the end of the alias
batchProcess.addParams: Increase or decrease a specified parameter

editor.touchMode: Preutter will move to the place you clicked and other parameters will follow. Individual parameters cannot be operated.

footer.disclaimer: UTAU is a singing voice synthesis software created for Windows and published by 飴屋／菖蒲
footer.disclaimer2: This software is not affiliated with UTAU official.

error.title: Error
error.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please download the log from the button below and send it to the developer.
